articles.author: Marina Temkin
articles.title: Khosla Ventures among VCs experimenting with AI-infused roll-ups of mature companies - TechCrunch
articles.description: VC firms are pioneering a new investment strategy: acquiring established businesses and optimizing them with AI to boost efficiency and customer reach.
articles.content:
Venture capitalists have always focused on investing in companies that leverage technology to either disrupt established industries or create entirely new business categories.
But some VCs are start… [+2640 chars]
